pkgmetadata.longdescription: Response from Genotype to Environment // Compute yield-stability index based on Bayesian methodology, which is useful for analyze multi-environment trials in plant breeding programs. References: Cotes Torres JM, Gonzalez Jaimes EP, and Cotes Torres A (2016) https://revistas.unimilitar.edu.co/index.php/rf cb/article/view/2037 Seleccion de Genotipos con Alta Respuesta y Estabilidad Fenotipica en Pruebas Regionales: Recuperando el Concepto Biologico.
